title: Google\Cloud\Recommender\V1\ValueMatcher
name: ValueMatcher
description:
Contains various matching options for values for a GCP resource field.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.recommender.v1.ValueMatcher

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.matches_pattern
params.description: To be used for full regex matching. The regular expression is using the Google RE2 syntax (https://github.com/google/re2/wiki/Syntax), so to be used with RE2::FullMatch
